name: Nepali Romanization, 1997
description: Survey Department, Ministry of Land Management, Cooperatives and Poverty Alleviation, Government of Nepal.
notes:
ं (anusvara) is rendered by
ṅ before क, ख, ग, and घ
ñ before च, छ, ज, and झ
ṇ before ट, ठ, ड, and ढ
n before त, थ, द, and ध
ṁ before य, र, ल, व, श, ष, स
